Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Florist \Flo"rist\ (? or ?; 277), n. [Cf. F. fleuriste, floriste, fr. F. fleur flower. See {Flower}.] 1. A cultivator of, or dealer in, flowers. [1913 Webster]
2. One who writes a flora, or an account of plants. [1913 Webster]
florist n 1: someone who grows and deals in flowers; "the florist made up an attractive bouquet" 2: a shop where flowers and ornamental plants are sold [syn: {florist shop}, {flower store}]
